Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.match_data

Class MatchData

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.match_data.MatchData
public class MatchData
extends java.lang.Object
This class contains information needed for a match. Every match is reset and repopulated
